script:
[L...O...A...D...I...N...G... You must be...the new admin. Yes. You possess incredible power... OK.] 
 [This was prohibited by the previous admin...] 
 [He may end up destroying a planet or two, but such is life.] 
 [The benefits of this final battle outweigh the collateral damage.] 
 [...Impressive. That may have been too easy for the new admin...]
